headline: The Ralph Lauren Corporate Foundation to Open Fourth Center in the US with the University of Chicago Medicine Comprehensive Cancer Center
summary: NEW YORK, January 21, 2026--The Ralph Lauren Corporate Foundation today announced it has awarded a grant to the University of Chicago Medicine Comprehensive Cancer Center to establish the UChicago Medicine Ralph Lauren Center, building on the Foundation’s commitment to expand or open five cancer centers across the United States. The UChicago Medicine Ralph Lauren Center will enhance access to high-quality cancer screening, comprehensive cancer care and support services, serving a catchment area

content.title: The Ralph Lauren Corporate Foundation to Open Fourth Center in the US with the University of Chicago Medicine Comprehensive Cancer Center

The UChicago Medicine Ralph Lauren Center will enhance access to high-quality cancer screening, comprehensive cancer care and support services, serving a catchment area

headline: Ralph Lauren CEO: Why the Olympics Still Matter for Global Brands
summary: Ralph Lauren CEO Patrice Louvet speaks with the WSJ Leadership Institute’s Alan Murray about why moments like the upcoming Winter Olympics still bring people together—and how a quintessential American brand like Ralph Lauren maintains global appeal amid deglobalization and geopolitical fragmentation.

content.title: Ralph Lauren CEO: Why the Olympics Still Matter for Global Brands
content.description: Ralph Lauren CEO Patrice Louvet speaks with the WSJ Leadership Institute’s Alan Murray about why moments like the upcoming Winter Olympics still bring people together—and how a quintessential American brand like Ralph Lauren maintains global appeal amid deglobalization and geopolitical fragmentation.
